API Documentation¶

FIXME: to be completed

soho.builder module¶

class soho.builder.Builder(asset_dir, assets_only, base_url, do_nothing, force, hide_index_html, locale_dir, ignore_files, logger, out_dir, src_dir, sitemap, template, template_dir)¶

Driver class.

translate(msgid, domain=None, mapping=None, default=None, context=None)¶

Translate the given msgid.

None default values seem to be required by Chameleon, which may call ‘translate(msgid)’ even when translation is not requested by the template.

soho.i18n module¶

class soho.i18n.TranslatorWrapper(locale_dir)¶

A wrapper that hold instances of gettext.GNUTranslations and take care of choosing the right one depending on the domain and the locale that are requested at translation time.

load_translations(locale_dir)¶

Load translations from files located in locale_dir.

translate(locale, msgid, domain, mapping)¶

Translate msgid in the requested locale.

soho.i18n.interpolate(s, mapping)¶

Interpolate params in the given string s with values provided in mapping (if any).

soho.utils module¶

class soho.utils.Sitemap¶

A class that can generate Sitemap files.

See http://www.sitemaps.org/ for further details about the format of the file.

add(path, url, change_freq, priority)¶

Add a URL to the Sitemap.

write(out)¶

Write the Sitemap to the given out stream.

soho.utils.hide_index_html_from(path)¶

Remove index.html suffix as well as trailing slashes (if any).

soho.utils.read_dir_metadata(dir_path)¶

Return metadata associated to the given directory (if any).

soho.utils.read_file_metadata(file_path)¶

Return metadata associated to the given file (if any).

soho.utils.register_plugin(registry, spec, *keys)¶

Register a plugin.

registry
should be a dict-like object.
spec
the full path to a class, e.g. 'soho.renderers.zpt.ZPTRenderer'.
keys
one or more keys under which the plugin will be registered. At least one key must be provided.

soho.generators package¶

soho.generators.__init__.get_generator(path, *args, **kwargs)¶

Return an instance of the generator for the given file, or None if none could be found.

soho.generators.html module¶

Define the HTMLGenerator, which takes HTML as input and return the same HTML as output.

soho.generators.rst module¶

Define the ReSTGenerator, which takes reStructuredText as input and return HTML as output.

soho.renderers¶

soho.renderers.__init__.get_renderer(path, *args, **kwargs)¶

Return a renderer for the given template, or None if none could be found.

soho.renderers.zpt module¶

Define the ZPTRenderer that can render ZPT (Zope Page Templates).
